heroes.name: Aelira Moonshadow
heroes.description: Aelira is a lone wanderer with a deep bond to nature and a vendetta against dark creatures that plague the wild.

heroes.name: Thorben Ironfist
heroes.description: A seasoned warrior who served in the mountain wars, Thorben is loyal, disciplined, and always ready to protect his allies.

heroes.name: Nyx Vexx
heroes.description: A trickster who made a pact with a dark entity for power, Nyx hides her sinister edge behind a charming smile.

heroes.name: Milo Underfoot
heroes.description: Sneaky, fast, and always two steps ahead, Milo thrives in the shadows and lives for the next big score.
